title: Confi-Dance: Memoirs of an Asian Businesswoman's Journey from a Traditional Upbringing into Unconditional Love
features: "May Lam Rocco is an independent woman, a successful woman, and an inspiration... Her story is valuable in any culture."
Bob Livingston, Speaker-elect of the US House of Representatives
Discover the power of unconditional love with
Confi-Dance
a memoir that tells the true story of an Asian Businesswoman who broke free from the traditional expectations of her family and found the courage to follow her dreams and true self.
Written with candid honesty and vulnerability, this book is an inspiration for anyone who has ever struggled with societal pressure and the search for self-acceptance.
This powerful and enlightening memoir will speak to:
Businesswomen around the world
Businesswomen around the world
Those seeking to repair relationships
Those seeking to repair relationships
Those confined by a traditional upbringing
Those confined by a traditional upbringing
And those struggling to rebuild their confidence
And those struggling to rebuild their confidence
Click the button above and be moved by the story of one woman's journey to self-discovery, acceptance, and unconditional love.
What others are saying about
Confi-Dance

"As an Asian woman, I can particularly relate well to May's growing path from a traditional Chinese family and its expectations of a girl. People of similar backgrounds will discover the power of learning to love oneself unconditionally and the strength of it. Even if you are not Asian, you will discover the value of looking back on the journey you have taken and will find energy for the next chapter."
Carol Shen, former president of Gucci China
Confi-Dance
, is a book with lessons for everyone. May Lam Rocco takes us on her journey, but it is also easy to see our own journeys in her story."
Ron Price, president, TTI Success Insights
description: "May Lam Rocco is an independent woman, a successful woman, and an inspiration to women around the world. Her story is valuable in any culture." Bob Livingston, Speaker-elect of the House of US Representative

author: {'avatar': 'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/amzn-author-media-prod/bhia2o1tmmg8uf8tl2h1orfufr._SY600_.jpg', 'name': 'May Lam Rocco', 'about': ['May Lam Rocco was born in Hong Kong to a very traditional Chinese family. After leaving her family business, she successfully built and sold a leadership training and development consulting company in China. She is now dedicated to promoting relationships between parents and children and helping others build their confidence. Having previously lived and worked in Hong Kong, Brunei, Taiwan, the UK, and China, she currently splits her time between the United States and Asia.']}
